column6: I always visit the brand/ store website to check out their latest jewellery designs
column7: I like the status that comes from owning certain brands
column8: I like to take my time in deciding which product to buy
column9: I love to share my experience of shopping with others
column10: I prefer designs that are classic/ timeless rather than trendy
column11: I rely on magazines to keep me up to date on latest jewellery designs
column12: I tend to go back to the same store if I buy diamond jewellery
column13: If I like a product I will buy it no matter what the price
column14: Its important to me that salespeople are knowledgeable about products that they are selling
column15: Service of store personnel is an important part of my decision to shop there
column16: When a celebrity designs a product I am more likely to buy it
column17: When I buy diamond jewellery, the quality of the diamond matters more to me than the size of the diamond
